General.Name: Metropolitan Kentjana Tbk
General.Description: PT Metropolitan Kentjana Tbk develops and manages land and buildings in Indonesia. The company operates through Shopping Center, Office, Apartment, Real Estate, Air/Water Park, and Hotel segments. It also engages in the rental of space in shopping centers, office buildings, and apartments; and sale of land and buildings. PT Metropolitan Kentjana Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Pondok Indah Plaza 2, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12310
